name: Buzzy Bee
description:
You are a bee. Collect pollen to help continue the pollination process so your hive can make more honey. 

But be careful! You don't want to bump into anything or get caught by any predators on your way.

Use your mouse to guide the bee past obstacles and enemies to earn points, and collect pollen to increase your score multiplier.

CONTROL TYPES

Hold - holding the mouse button down makes the bee fly up

Tap - clicking the mouse button makes the bee jump up
